description: Designed and developed Spring-Boot applications for backend processes, developed REST services for mobile clients, worked on 12+ WordPress plugins and themes, enhancing functionality and user satisfaction by 35%.

Completed 15+ projects for international clients, start-ups, and SMEs across diverse industries with a 100% satisfaction rate. Developed Java-based Spring Boot RESTful APIs and microservices, cutting application response times by 25%. Delivered 5+ payment plugins, streamlining transactions for applications serving over 30,000 users. Provided personalized Java programming and Spring Framework tutoring, helping clients upskill and improve their technical proficiency.

Developed full-stack web applications using Java and Spring Boot, reducing response times by 28%. Collaborated in an Agile team of 7 developers, optimizing real-time data processing with Apache Kafka to enhance mission-critical operations. Established CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins, Docker, and Kubernetes, accelerating deployments by 30%.
